thread.title: Don and Diane Rake
thread.title_full: Easy Tours of India reviewed by Don and Diane Rake

author: Don and Diane Rake
title: Don and Diane Rake
text: We did the 18 day history and culture trip that covered much of central India. Started at Delhi and ended at Mumbai. India is wonderful and Easy Tours made it especially enjoyable. Our guide, Hitesh Sharma, was terrific. We'll be booking through Easy Tours again.
